sentences.english: Waiting at the front, that won't always be heavy rain and strong waves.
sentences.chinese: 等侯在前方的，不會永遠是暴雨和惡浪。

sentences.english: Elang risk in the wind when you have ups and downs in the hands of Flanagan straw.
sentences.chinese: 是在險風惡浪中沉浮時你手中的那根稻草。

sentences.english: We had a rough crossing from Japan to China.
sentences.chinese: 我們頂着險風惡浪從日本橫渡到中國。

sentences.english: No, what you're witnessing at sea is a rogue wave, also called a freak wave.
sentences.chinese: 你所遭遇的是“惡浪”，也稱“怪浪”。

sentences.english: Only dare to set sail, top evil billow warriors, to fight to the upstream.
sentences.chinese: 只有敢於揚起風帆，頂惡浪的勇士，才能爭到上游。
他們勇敢地與災禍的惡浪搏鬥。
